Activity:
We can see when players last log in, but just logging in is not enough. Every member is expected to take part in **Crew Wars** to stay active.

Every 2 weeks we check your **total Crew Wars wins**. If your wins stay the same for 2 checks in a row, we will see you as **inactive** and may contact you to ask what’s going on.

To avoid this, join Crew Wars when you can and keep your **total wins** up to date in <#1434444189084684318> using the **Update CWS Wins** button.
Updating Wins:
After each Crew Wars event, update your **total Crew Wars wins** in <#1434444189084684318> using the **Update CWS Wins** button.

Always enter your **overall total number of wins**, not just the wins from one event. If you enter the wrong number by mistake, staff can fix it for you.
Absence: If you cannot play for a while (holiday, school, or other reasons), please **message a staff member** and tell us. We will mark you as away so you are not counted as inactive.
In-Game Behavior: Be **kind and respectful** to other players. What you do shows what our crew is like. Do not be toxic or rude. If there is a problem, talk to a leader or mod instead of starting fights.
Leaving the Crew: You can play however you want! If you want to leave, start a new crew, or join another one, that’s okay — just **tell us first**. Leaving without saying anything is seen as disrespectful and may get you blocked or banned.
Crew Storage:
Storage is for **trusted, active members**. It helps everyone share and grow stronger together.
**Rules:**
• Return Pokémon or items after use (especially before logging out)
• Do not trade, keep, or sell things from storage
• Misuse can make you lose access or get banned from storage
